label: 明月記
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
説明文: The diary of Fujiwara no Sadaie (1162-1241), a member of the Northern Fujiwara (hokke) branch who was an accomplished scholar and poet, though he never reached the top of the court hierarchy. Sadaie wrote consistently in his diary from the age of eighteen to his death, covering some six decades of the early Kamakura era. One of the most valuable sources for the early Kamakura age.
